Elisabeth achète sa marchandise trois fois par mois au marché et demande ce prêt pour commander quelque sac de soja. Elisabeth souhaite tirer un bénéfice et  contribuer à l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Elisabeth is a 31-year-old married woman.  A mother of four children under her care, she lives in Vakpositoto and actively works for their development.

To achieve her goals, Elisabeth prepares and sells soy beans throughout her neighborhood to satisfy her customers. She stocks up on supplies three times a month at the market.

Elisabeth is requesting this loan to order several bags of soy beans. She wants to make a profit and contribute towards her children's education.

loans.use: buy one bag of soja beans

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Rosalina works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from tailoring. Rosalina is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

Rosalina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 42 years old and is married with six children, three of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Josephine has a herbal medicine business in the Philippines, and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of herbal medicine to resell. Josephine has been in this business for three years. 

In the future, Josephine would like to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of herbal medicine to resell.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 47 years old and married with four children.

Gina earns a living by fattening pigs in the Philippines. She has been fattening pigs for three years and also earns additional income from tailoring. Gina is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feed and other supplies for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feed and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Asiya's Group

texts.en:
Asiya is 34 years old and has 8 children. She is a group leader and is representing her group formed by 13 farmers in Webuye District, Kenya. 

Asiya has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds and, although she described her last harvest as excellent, she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Asiya also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study.

Obtaining this loan means that Asiya's Group will be able to receive a total of 12 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 10 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 59 years old and is married with nine children. With two children in school, Rosalinda works very hard to provide for them.

Rosalinda runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 20 years now. Rosalinda has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her general store, such as coffee, feed, home care products and other groceries.

In the future, Rosalinda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store, such as coffee, feed, home care products and other groceries.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria has always been enthusiastic of farming. She has cultivated their rice land in Tambulig, Zamboanga del Norte and has made good earnings doing this type of work. 

Recently, Gloria applied for a loan to pay for land and seedbed preparations for the next cropping season, and for the purchase of higher yielding rice seeds and bags of fertilizer. This will ensure that the rice field is ready for planting. Gloria knows that she has to get things right to yield more income for this cropping season. 

In the future, Gloria hopes to buy a hauling truck for the easy transport of produce.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparations for the next cropping season, and for the purchase of higher yielding rice seeds and bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a feed retailing business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy more feed to sell to customers.

Teresita successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is re-listing Teresita's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more feed to sell to customers.

loans.name: Tres Barrios De Ccoricancha Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “TRES BARRIOS DE CCORICANCHA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Chinchero y departamento de Cusco.
 La socia es la Sra. Valeriana, la socia sigue  dedicándose al negocio  de venta y crianza de ganados, la socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido, a la vez la socia continua dedicándose a la agricultura, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de abono entre otros.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.
La socia que sale en la foto adjunta pidio permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
These members belong to the Communal Bank "Tres Barrios de Ccoricancha" (Three Neighborhoods of Ccoricancha). The bank is located in the District of Chinchero in Chinchero Province, Department of Cusco.

One of the members is Sra. Valeriana. She continues to manage a business of raising and selling livestock. Valeriana is grateful to those who have helped her to fulfill her dream in this manner, so she promises to complete her payments according to the established terms. She is a responsible and diligent individual who works in agriculture. By working in this manner, she is able to help her family get ahead. She is requesting a loan in order to buy compost and other supplies.

The other members sell animals, sell handicrafts, sell groceries, and sell food.

The member who appears in the attached photo requested permission to arrive late to the meeting because of work reasons.

loans.use: to buy compost and other supplies.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana tiene 18 años, vive en la ciudad de Paraguarí, está estudiando la carrera de Contabilidad. Tiene como meta poder ser una profesional que pueda ayudar a las demás personas.
Quiere montar su propio estudio contable para poder dar a su familia una ayuda para mejorar su vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su universidad, para poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Ana is 18 years old and lives in the city of Paraguarí. She is studying for a degree in Accounting. Her goal is to become a professional so that she can help other people. Ana would like to establish her own accounting practice so that she can provide her family the assistance they need in order to improve their lives.

She is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the payment of her university fees. This will enable her to continue her studies just as before.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Patricia Carolina

texts.es:
Patricia, es una joven que tiene como fuente de ingresos una venta de mariscos, vive con sus padres, es madre soltera de un niño de 7 años de edad, ella sola tiene la responsabilidad de sacar a su hijo adelante, trabaja de lunes a viernes y tiene su negocio desde hace 6 años, por el momento no representa dificultades para continuar trabajando.
Comprará camarones, pescado, conchas y otros mariscos que le ayudaran a brindar variedad de productos a sus clientes, el préstamo le será de utilidad para abastecer su negocio con productos frescos cada vez que lo requiera.
Su visión es administrar bien el crédito para que sus utilidades sean mayores.
texts.en:
Patricia is a young woman who makes a living selling seafood.

She lives with her parents and her 7-year-old child. She is a single mother, so she has to provide for her son by herself.

She works Monday to Friday selling seafood, a business she has had for 6 years. For now, it seems there are no great difficulties to continue working. 

She is going to buy shrimp, fish, 'conchas' and other seafood to expand the range of products she offers to her customers. The loan will help her stock her store with fresh products whenever she needs.

Her plan is to manage the loan carefully to make it last longer.

loans.use: to buy shrimp, fish, 'conchas' and other seafood to expand the range of products she offers to her customers

loans.name: Maria De La Paz

texts.es:
María, se decidió por un nuevo crédito para fortalecer su negocio con la compra de fardos de ropa usada y otros productos de uso personal que sus clientes demandan, espera mantener su negocio funcionando y atraer nuevos clientes.
Con el financiamiento anterior ha mantenido en el mercado la venta de ropa, mejorado su situación financiera y optimizado sus condiciones de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Maria decided to request a new loan to strengthen her business by buying bales of used clothes and other personal use products that her customers demand. She hopes to keep the business running and attract new customers.

With the previous loan she has managed to stay in business and to improve her financial situation and her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bales of used clothes and other personal use products that her customers demand

loans.name: Altynai

texts.ru: Алтынай, 46 лет, замужем, 2 детей. У Алтынай - средне-специальное образование. В поисках дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, она 17 лет назад стала заниматься животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Алтынай, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 6 овец. Также есть земельный надел мерою 0,48 Га, где она выращивает картофель и помидоры для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Алтынай обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 25 овей и 800 кг. семян картофеля и удобрений для обработки почвы. Доходы от кредита Алтынай планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества овец, также постройку сарая с навесом.
texts.en:
Altynai is 46 years old, married, and has two children.  She has a specialized secondary level education and, as a way to earn an additional income for her family, 17 years ago she started a cattle and farming business.  As a result of her hard work, today Altynai has six sheep and 0.48 ha of land where she grows tomatoes and potatoes, which she sells.  Altynai's monthly income amounts to 15,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to further developing her business, Altynai applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy 25 sheep and 800 kg of potato seed and fertilizer for her land.  Altynai plans to reinvest her profits in further increasing the size of her herd and to build a barn with a covered open area.

loans.use: to buy 25 sheep for fattening and resale, as well 800 kg of potato seed and fertilizers for land cultivation

loans.name: Kalyibubu

texts.ru: Калыйбубу, 48 лет, замужем. У нее среднее образование, с 2008 года занимается животноводством и полеводством. На сегодняшний день Калыйбубу смогла развить свою деятельность, у нее есть 5 коров, 50 овец. Также 4,20 ГА земли, где Калыйбубу выращивает люцерну для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации в виде сена. Супруг и дети активно и с удовольствием помогают по хозяйству. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 90,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для разведения и увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Калыйбубу планирует направить на расширение ее бизнеса и постройку сарая.
texts.en:
Kalyibubu is 48 years old and married.  She has a secondary level education and since 2008 she has had a business in cattle and farming.  Since then, she has been able to develop her business to the point where she now has five cows and 50 sheep.  Kalyibubu also has 4.2 ha of land where she grows alfalfa both for use in her business and for outside sales of hay.  Her husband and children happily take an active role in helping with the business.

With an aim to further developing her business, Kalyibubu applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 90,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle to increase the size of her herd.  Kalyibubu plans to use her profits from the loan to expand her business and to build a barn.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Tilla

texts.ru: Тилла, 46 лет, замужем, только сын живет с родителями, остальные проживают отдельно. У Тиллы средне-специальное образование, 10 лет назад в качестве дополнительного дохода она стала заниматься сельским хозяйством. У нее в хозяйстве есть 4 коровы, овца, также есть земельный надел размером 1,0 Га, где выращивается кукуруза. На сегодняшний день ее деятельность приносит хорошую ежемесячную прибыль - 10,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Тилла обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 коров. Доходы от кредита она планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства и улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en:
Tilla is 46 years old and married.  They have only one child at home; the others live on their own. Tilla has a specialized secondary level education and, for a source of additional income, she started an agriculture business 10 years ago.  She has four cows, a sheep, and 1.0 ha of land where she grows corn.  Today, her business brings in a good monthly profit of 10,000 som (KGS).  

In order to develop her business further, Tilla applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy three cows.   She plans to use the profits from the loan to expand her business and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy three cows for fattening and resale

loans.name: Cesar Miguel

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 65 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad habitada por gente amable que se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales, se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, se dedica a este negocio desde hace 10 años. Solicita préstamo para la compra de cuyes, patos, gallina, pavos, entre otros animales para incrementar su negocio, el préstamo le ayudará a ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales para satifacer las necesidades de sus cliente lo que le generará mayores ingresos y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar is 65 years old. He lives with his common-law wife in a private house in a rural area in Oyotun district, a community of kind people who mostly engage in agriculture, commerce, and raising animals.  It is located in Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

Cesar raises and sells small animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys, etc. and has been doing this for ten years. He is asking for a loan so he can buy guinea pigs, ducks, hens, turkeys, and others so he can expand his business.  The loan will help him to provide a greater variety of animals to satisfy the needs of his customers.  This will generate greater income leading to a better quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, ducks, hens, turkeys, and other animals to expand his business.

loans.name: Tamara

texts.ru: Тамара, 35 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей, самой младшей 8 лет. У Тамары - высшее образование, с 2000 года занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Тамары на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, 10 овец, на 1,50 Га она выращивает картофель и фасоль для реализации. Экологически чистая и вкусная сельскохозяйственная продукция пользуется большим спросом, принося ежемесячный доход около 8,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Тамара обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец, для увеличения поголовья скота, что в будущем поможет улучшить материальные и жилищные условия семьи Тамары.
texts.en:
Tamara is 35 years old, married, and the mother of four children, the youngest of whom is 8.  Tamara has a higher education, and since 2000, she has had a farming and cattle business.  As a result of her hard work, today Tamara has two cows, 10 sheep, and 1.50 ha of land where she grows potatoes and beans which she sells.  There is a strong demand for her environmentally friendly and delicious crops, which bring in a monthly income of about 8,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to further developing her business, Tamara applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 35,000 som (KGS) to buy 10 sheep in order to increase the size of her herd.  This will help her to later improve her family's material and living conditions.

loans.use: to buy 10 sheep for fattening up and subsequent resale

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es:
Teofilo tiene 63 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico junto a su esposa y su hijo de 14 años en el distrito de Pucará, una comunidad dedica a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales, ubicada en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de maíz. Cuenta con experiencia en este rubro y con buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos. El préstamo lo utilizará para invertir en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo, esta inversión le permitirá ganancias para mejorar su condición económica y por ende invertir en mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Teofilo is 63 years old, he lives in a house that he owns made of rustic material with his wife and his 14-yeard-old son in the district of Pucará, a community dedicated to agriculture, commerce, and livestock, located in the province of Jaén, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. 

He works in agriculture, specifically in maize crops. He has experience in this area and good references from his neighbors. The loan will be used to invest in the purchase of manure and fertilizers for the maintenance of his crops. This investment will give him a profit to improve his economic condition, and therefore invest in better life conditions.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of manure and fertilizers for the maintenance of his crops.

loans.name: Zhamila

texts.ru: Жамила, 54 года, вдова, мать 4 детей, младший сын живет с ней и помогает по хозяйству. У Жамилы среднее образование, уже много лет она занимается сельским хозяйством. Сегодня в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 6 овец, также на собственном земельном наделе мерою 1,0 Га она занимается полеводством, выращивая арбузы и кукурузу. Дополнительно Жамила торгует на рынке фруктами: яблоками, хурмой, виноградом, мандаринами. Деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме до 20,000 сомов(KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь, поэтому Жамила решила развить свою деятельность и обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, часть средств направит на закуп фруктов для торговли. В будущем Жамила планирует направлять доходы от кредита на развитие своей деятельности.
texts.en:
Zhamila is 54 years old, a widow, and the mother of four children.  Her youngest son still lives at home and helps her with the housework.  Zhamila has a secondary level education and for many years, she has owned an agriculture business.  Today, Zhamila has two cows, six sheep, as well as 1.0 ha of land where she raises watermelon and corn.  Additionally, Zhamila has a place at the bazaar where she sells fruit including apples, persimmons, grapes, and mandarin oranges.  Her businesses bring in a monthly profit of 20,000 som (KGS), which is not enough to lead a decent life.

Because of this, Zhamila decided to expand her business and applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle as well as fruit to sell at the bazaar.  Zhamila plans to use her future profits from the loan to further develop her business.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock and to increase the turnover of fruits in her shop in order to increase her income

loans.name: Kulbarcha

texts.ru: Кулбарча, 58 лет, замужем, есть 4 детей. Кулбарча на протяжении 15 лет занимается разведением скота и полеводством, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 2 бычка, также выращивает картофель на 1,20 Га земли. Пенсия и прибыль от бизнеса - единственный источник пропитания и дохода для семьи. Кулбарча обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Это позволит Кулбарче развить и приумножить поголовье скота. В будущем, она мечтает накопить на покупку уже 10 овец.
texts.en:
Kulbarcha is 58 years old, married, and has four children.  For the last 15 years, she has been in the cattle and farming business.  Today, she has two steers and grows potatoes on her 1.2 ha of land.  Her pension and the profits from her business are the only source of income and sustenance for her family.

Kulbarcha has applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 15,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep.  This will allow Kulbarcha to increase the size of her herd.  Her dream is to one day save up enough to buy 10 sheep.

loans.use: to buy some sheep in order to increase the size of her herd

loans.name: Gs Santa Rosa El Prado Group

texts.es:
Don Eduardo, tiene 52 años de edad, es padre de cinco  hijos, convive con su esposa, Su actividad principal es la caficultura y la producción y  venta de plátano cuenta con más de 9 años de dedicarse a esta  actividad alterna a la caficultura este tipo de actividad tiene un muy buen mercado tanto local como nacional también se dedica al transporte ya que cuenta con su vehículo en el que transporta pasajeros de su aldea hacia la ciudad de Trojes y viceversa.
Don Eduardo con el crédito que a solicitado le contribuirá a tener una mayor producción de sus productos ya que desea comprar buenos fertilizantes y abonos para su tierra y pagar mano de obra, lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares y compromisos financieros.
Con el apoyo que reciba del préstamo le contribuirá a lograr sus sueños que son hacer a su familia mas prospera y darles una vida mejor.
Juan Elías, Fredy Adolfo, José Cristino y Elvin Enrique todos ellos se dedican también a la caficultura y producción de Plátano ya que es un rubro que tiene mercado en la zona y el clima se presta para hacer este tipo de actividad.


                                                                                         Trojes, Honduras Febrero 2015
texts.en:
Eduardo, 52 years old, is the father of five children. He lives with his wife and his primary work is growing coffee and growing and selling plantains. He worked for more than 9 years in this activity alternating with growing coffee. This type of work has a very good local market as well as national market. He also works in transportation since he has a vehicle in which he transports passengers from his town to the city of Trojes and back.

With the loan he is requesting, it will contribute to Eduardo having a better production of his products since he wants to purchase good fertilizer and manure for his land and pay labor costs, which will permit him to improve his income to cover family expenses and financial obligations.

With the support that he gets from the loan, it will contribute to achieving his dreams which are to make his family more prosperous and give them a better life.

Juan Elías, Fredy Adolfo, José Cristino and Elvin Enrique all also work in growing coffee and plantains since it is a field that has a market in the zone and the climate fits this type of work. 


                                                                                         Trojes, Honduras, February 2015

loans.use: to purchase good fertilizer and manure for his land and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Gs Buenos Aires Group

texts.es:
La Señora Oneida Ebedun, tiene 50 años de edad, es madre de un hijo, convive con su esposo  Su actividad principal es la venta de productos de la canasta básica familiar, cuenta con más de 11 años de dedicarse a esta  actividad. Doña Ebedun pasa muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado. 
Doña Ebedun con el crédito que solicita le permitirá tener un mayor surtido en el negocio y esto le vendrá a mejorar sus ingresos en el hogar, lo que le permitirá cubrir los gastos familiares y compromisos financieros contraídos, ella desea comprar Frijoles, Arroz, Azúcar, Manteca, Pollo, Carnes, Papel higienico, Café, Pan, refrescos, jabón y otros productos de consumo básico.
Doña Ebedun con el apoyo que reciba del préstamo le contribuirá a lograr sus sueños.
Ana tiene su pequeño negocio que es la venta de abarrotería.
Francisco se dedica al destazo de cerdo.                                                     

                                                                                      Trojes, Honduras Marzo 2015
texts.en:
Mrs. Oneida Ebedun is 50 years old. She has one son and lives with her husband. Her main business is to sell  basic family need products. She has been doing this for the past 11 years. Mrs. Ebedun is very grateful with the institution for the support provided. This loan will allow her to better supply her business, and will lead to improve her earnings at home which will allow her to cover the family expenses and financial commitments incurred. She wants to buy beans, rice, sugar, lard, chicken, meats, toilette paper, coffee, bread, beverages, soap, and other products of basic consumption. The support received from this loan, will help Mrs. Ebedun achieve her dreams. Ana has a small grocery store, and Francisco works as a pork butcher. 

Trojes, Honduras - March 2015

loans.use: To buy beans, rice, sugar, lard, chicken, meats, toilette paper, coffee, bread, beverages, soap and other products of basic consumption for their business.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina tiene 45 años de edad, vive sola en una casa alquilada de material rústico en la parte rural del distrito de Querocotillo, provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La población de este distrito se dedica principalmente a la agricultura y comercio.

Marina se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general así como ropa, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio. Marina cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en el distrito. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de mayor cantidad de mercadería para su negocio, con ello contará con un mayor inventario en su tienda, obtendrá mayores ingresos y así podrá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marina is 45 years old. She lives alone in a rented house made of rustic material in the rural part of Querocotillo district, Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. The population in this district works primarily in agriculture and trade. 

Marina works selling general groceries and clothing. Her business is located in her house. Marina has very good personal and work references in the district. The loan will be used to purchase a greater quantity of merchandise for her business. With it, she will have a better inventory in her store, will get better income, and will be able to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 55 years old, married and has eight children (one child still in school). She is in an agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Virginia has been in this business for 20 years now and has borrowed once in the past from Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) to sustain it.

Virginia has requested a 4,000 Philippine peso loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock. In the future, Virginia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru: Замира, 33 года, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Образование - среднее. Около 5 лет назад начала заниматься животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря непосильному труду Замиры и ее емкой работе, она достигла хороших успехов в развитии хозяйства и стала получать прибыль в сумме до 25,000 сом (KGS) в квартал. Есть земельный надел мерою 0,09 ГА, где она выращивает картофель. Замира также торгует овощами на рынке.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение товара в обороте. Доходы от кредита Замира планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнеса и накопить на строительство дома.
texts.en:
Zamira is 33 years old, married, and has three children.  She has a secondary level education.  About five years ago, she started a farming and cattle business.  She has 0.09 ha of land where she grows potatoes and she also sells vegetables at the bazaar.  As a result of her back-breaking labor and unending work, she has enjoyed good success in developing her business and has begun to earn a quarterly profit of up to 25,000 som (KGS).

With the goal of further developing her business, Zamira applied to  Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to increase the size of her inventory.  Zamira plans to invest the profits from the loan in her business for future growth and to save up money to build a home.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale in her shop

loans.name: Salamat

texts.ru: Саламат, 53 года, замужем, образование - среднее. С 2010 года, занимается сельским хозяйством, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве есть 5 коров, 30 овец. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 17,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Саламат обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Саламат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и хочет купить мебель для дома.
texts.en:
Salamat is 53 years old and married.  She has a secondary level education.  Since 2010 she has owned an agriculture business and today she has five cows and 30 sheep.  Her monthly profit comes to about 17,000 som (KGS).  

With an aim to further developing her business, Salamat applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle in order to increase the size of her herd.  Salamat plans to invest the profits from the loan in further increasing the size of her herd.  She would also like to buy some furniture for her home.

loans.use: to buy livestock in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Alexander is a widower and lives in Molave, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. For a living, he engages in running a car wash business for the local community. Alexander has been doing this for 12 years. 

He approached Paglaum MPC for the needed capital for his existing business. He applied for a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase new equipment for his car wash business. 

Alexander is a regular and active member of PMPC. 

In the future, he hopes to save money for future business expansion. He wants to complete his house and to live a happy and healthy life with his family.

loans.use: to purchase new equipment for his car wash business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase nail clippers, key chains, locks, combs, brushes, meat, butter, seasonings, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Puthea

texts.en: Puthea is 27 years old, a single school-car driver living in the Kampong Speu province in Cambodia. He has worked as a driver since 2015, making approximately $6 per day. Puthea would like to buy a motorcycle to commute to work, but he doesn’t have enough money, and now he is securing a loan. The loan will enable him to buy a motorcycle and reduce travel expenses. In the future, he wants to buy more soil to fill the yard around his house and save money to buy construction materials to build a ground floor room.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to commute to work

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar tiene 21 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge y su menor hijo de 3 años de edad en el distrito de Pomahuaca que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café variedad catimore, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 5 años. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha, esto le ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a permitirle mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Edgar is 21 years old, lives in his own house with his spouse and their young son, 3 years old, in the district of Pomahuaca which is found in Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. The population of this district works primarily in agriculture, trade, and raising animals.

He works in agriculture, specifically in growing Catimore variety coffee. He has 5 years of experience in this field. The loan that will be granted to him will be used in agricultural work, applications and incorporation of phytosanitary products, fertilizer, and pay labor costs for his crop. This will help him with the physiological, morphological and productive improvement of his crop, and also to have a good harvest. In the end, he will have a better production and better quality product, so he will not have problems selling his products, which will generate more income which will allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to pay for applications and incorporation of phytosanitary products, fertilizer, and pay labor costs for his crop.

loans.name: Anthony Smith

texts.es:
Anthony tiene 28 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge y menores hijos en el distrito de Lagunas, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en mototaxi, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. Adicionalmente se dedica a brindar servicios de jornalería como peón agrícola. El préstamo lo utilizará para realizar reparaciones y arreglos en su vivienda ya que actulamente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Anthony espera mejorar las condiciones de su casa lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Anthony is 28 years old, lives in his own house with his spouse and young children in Lagunas district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. He lives in a community which works in trade, agriculture, and animal husbandry. 

He works offering transportation service to passengers in his motorcycle taxi. He has experience in this business and has good references from the population in his district. In addition, he works as a day laborer in agriculture. The loan will be used to make repairs and fix up his house since it is currently in bad condition. With this, Anthony hopes to improve the condition of his house which will allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to make repairs and fix up his house since it is currently in bad condition.

loans.name: Rose Ann

texts.en:
Rose Ann is 27 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school.

Rose Ann works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more items like soap, sardines, noodles, diapers and other groceries.

Rose Ann has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years, and also earns an income from food vending.

Rose Ann aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like soap, sardines, noodles, diapers and other groceries.

loans.name: Rosemary's Group

texts.en:
Rosemary is 43 years old and has 11 children. She has been a farmer for more than 20 years, and is always said to be a very hardworking individual. Even though Rosemary is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group formed by 11 farmers in Webuye District, Kenya.

Rosemary started working alongside One Acre Fund a few years ago, in 2011, and decided to do so because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since then, she has seen her life improve; especially in the sense that she has had more profits from each harvest ever since. This year she decided to represent her group because she wanted to spread the story of One Acre Fund farmers.

Rosemary’s Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of six acres of land. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of six solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season

loans.name: Tazhikan

texts.ru: Тажикан 62 года, вдова, дети взрослые. В настоящее она на пенсии и занимается животноводством. Тажикан имеет не только теоретические опыт в животноводстве, но и практические навыки. Она с большой ответственностью относится к своему делу. В хозяйстве есть 4 коровы и 13 овец. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 14,000 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь, поэтому Тажикан  обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита она будет вкладывать в развитие бизнеса и улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en:
Tazhikan is 62 years old and a widow.  Her children are all adults.  Currently she receives a pension and has a cattle business.  Tazhikan has more than a theoretical understanding of animal husbandry, she has practical skills and she takes her work very seriously.  Tazhikan has four cows and 13 sheep.  Her monthly profit comes to about 14,000 som (KGS).

This is not enough money to lead a decent life, so Tazhikan applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle. She plans to use the profits from the loan to expand her business and to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase livestock in order to increase her income

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гульнара, 41 год, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Образование - высшее, работает в школе учителем. Также Гульнара в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав в 1992 году. На ежедневной основе продает экологически-чистое, домашнее молоко. Благодаря упорному труду Гульнары, на данный момент в ее хозяйстве имеется 4 коровы. На участке мерою 1,11 Га она выращивает фасоль. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 дойных коров для увеличения объемов реализации молока. Гульнара является лидером группы "Нур", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их трое. Доходы от кредита Гульнара планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Gulnara is 41 years old, married, and has three children.  Gulnara has a higher education and is a school teacher but her family's main source of income is the agriculture business she started in 1992.  She sells ecologically friendly, fresh-from-the-farm milk on a daily basis. As a result of her hard work, today Gulnara has four cows and 1.11 ha of land where she grows beans.

With an aim to developing her business further, Gulnara applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy two cows so she can sell more milk.  Gulnara is the leader of the Nur Group, which consists of two other people.  Gulnara plans to invest the profits from the loan in expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows in order to increase the volume of her organic milk sales

loans.name: Emily's Group

texts.en:
Emily, pictured above, has seven children and is always described as a very hardworking individual, which is why she was selected to become the group leader of her group. Emily is representing her group of five farmers in Webuye District, and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

Emily has been a farmer for more than 30 years and, in order to earn enough to feed her family, she decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season. Her loan will not only include farming inputs but also a solar light, which she is very happy to be getting as that means she will now have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits from this coming season, Emily is planning to send her children to school.

A total of 2.25 acres will be planted by Emily's Group, and between them they will receive a total of four solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 32 years old, married, and has three children.  

She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Grace has been raising pig for two years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Grace requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pig.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pig

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her degree course in order to improve herself by studying medical technology.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 39 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico junto a su esposa y su hijo de 4 años en el distrito de Querocotillo que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La comunidad donde vive el cliente es una pequeña zona rural donde los habitantes se conocen y se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales.

El se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, entre otros. Cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes dan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos para incrementar el stock de su tienda, esta inversión le permitirá ganancias para mejorar su condición económica y por ende invertir en mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Santos is 39 years old, lives in his own house made of rustic materials with his wife and their 4-year-old child in Querocotillo district, which is located in Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. The community where he lives is a small rural zone where the inhabitants know each other and primarily work in agriculture, trade, and raising animals. 

He works selling groceries such as rice, sugar, oil, beans, and more. He has experience in this business and has regular customers who give him very good personal and work references. The loan will be used to purchase a greater quantity of products to increase the stock in his store. This investment will allow earnings to improve his economic conditions with the end of investing in better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of products to increase the stock in his store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Eleacer

texts.es:
Eleacer tiene 40 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge e hijos en el distrito de Huarmaca, ubicado en la provincia de Huancabamba, región Piura, en la sierra norte del Perú. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, su población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la cría y comercio de ganado caprino. Adicionalmente se dedica al comercio, compra y venta de animales menores como son cerdos, ovejas, etc. Cuenta con más de 8 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para comercializarlos, con esto Eleacer tendrá la posibilidad de aumentar sus ventas y obtener mejores utilidades lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Eleacer is 40 years old, in a common-law marriage and lives with his spouse and children in Huarmaca district, located in Huancabamba province, Piura region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in the district is peaceful, its population primarily works in agriculture, trade, and animal husbandry.

He works raising and selling goats. In addition, he works in trade, buying and selling small animals such as pigs, sheep, etc. He has more than 8 years of experience in the business and has very good personal and work references in the zone. The current loan will be to purchase a larger number of animals to sell them. With this, Eleacer will have the possibility of increasing his sales and getting more utility which will allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of animals to sell them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase material for his business such as wood, metal bars, nails, and more.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Dolores works hard to support her family.

She has a charcoal retailing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening.  Dolores is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy more stock of charcoal to sell.

Dolores has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. 

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more stock of charcoal

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina works hard to support her family. She is a widow, and has a karaoke entertainment business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional unit of a karaoke machine.

Regina has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase an additional unit of a karaoke machine

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is 46 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Vivian is borrowing PHP 9000 through NWTF to buy feed and vaccines for her pigs.

Vivian has been raising pigs for ten years and also earns income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward her dream: to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Bolotbek

texts.ru: Болотбек, 42 года, женат. Образование среднее, на протяжении 16 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав бизнес с суммы 15,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Болотбека в его хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, 20 овец, на участке мерою 1,0 Га арендованной и 1,48 Га собственной земли он выращивает фасоль. На ежедневной основе продает молоко. Болотбек обратился в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Он является одним из 3 участников группы "Нур". На полученные доходы от кредита Болотбек планирует и дальше увеличивать поголовье скота.
texts.en:
Bolotbek is 42 years old and married.  He has a secondary level education and for the last 16 years has owned a cattle and farming business that he started with 15,000 som (KGS).  As a result of his hard work, today Bolotbek has two cows, 20 sheep, and 1.48 ha of land.  He also rents another 1.0 ha of land and grows beans.  He sells milk on a daily basis.

Bolotbek applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep.  He is one of the three members of the Nur Group.  Bolotbek plans to use the profits from his loan to increase the size of his herd even more.

loans.use: to buy some sheep in order to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Aide

texts.es:
Rosa Aide tiene 36 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge e hijas en el distrito de Oyotún, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, su población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de alimentos contando con herramientas propias de trabajo. Cuenta con más de 2 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será para la compra de más herramientas de trabajo como ollas, platos, mesas, y sillas para implemetar su negocio, con esto Rosa Aide podrá trabajar en diferentes zonas que requieran sus servicios, ella espera mejorar la calidad de sus servicios lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Aide is 36 years old and is in a common-law relationship. She lives with her spouse and children in the district of Oyotún, located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the North Coast of Peru. Life in the district is quiet, it's people work mainly in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

Rosa works selling foods with her own work tools. She has more than 2 years in the business and has very good personal and work references from the area. She will use the present loan to buy more work tools like pots, plates, tables and chairs to use in her business. Doing this Rosa Aide can work in different areas that require her services. She hopes to improve the quality of her services which will generate more revenues to improve her quality of living and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy more working tools like pots, plates, tables and chairs to use in her business.

loans.name: Adoree Leah

texts.en:
Adoree Leah is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Adoree Leah is 49 years old now.

Adoree Leah has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell in her stall. Adoree Leah has been in this business for six years. 

In the future, Adoree Leah would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell in her stall

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Catherine works hard to support her family.

She has a spare parts retail business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from gasoline retailing. Catherine is borrowing PHP 25000 through NWTF to buy spare parts to sell to customers.

Catherine has sustained her business through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en:
Antonia is 64 years old and widowed with eight children. With two children in school, Antonia works very hard to provide for them.

Antonia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her general store, like coffee and other groceries.

Antonia has been in this business for 45 years and sells a variety of items such as biscuits, candies, etc.

In the future, Antonia would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like coffee and other groceries.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is married and works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from a general store.  Corazon is borrowing PHP 29500 through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her stall.

Corazon has sustained her business through her past 31 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.en:
Claudia, 45, is a married woman with six children. Three attend school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Claudia has a buy and sell coconut wine business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell.

Claudia has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell.

loans.name: Welsonia

texts.en:
Welsonia is 73 years old, widowed and has five children.  

Welsonia is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. Welsonia requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of feed and vitamins.

Welsonia has been farming for 20 years now, and has borrowed 21 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Welsonia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of feed and vitamins

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: Rubén de ahora 20 años de edad, se encuentra profundamente agradecido por el prestamo anterior, pues gracias a ello logro construir su casa, y logro que su familia tuviera una mejor condición de vida, él cuenta que antes del crédito, su familia no contaba con una vivienda adecuada para ellos. Ruben ahora solicita un nuevo prestamo con el afán de mejorar sus materiales como pescador, pero una de las dificultades que Ruben tiene es que no cuenta con suficiente   dinero para poder comprar atarrayas y mayas para seguir pescando y obtener sus ingresos. Ruben tiene las esperanzas de conseguir nuevamente el crédito para que su familia siga prosperando.
texts.en:
Rubén, age 20, is profoundly grateful for the previous loan.  Thanks to the loan, he managed to build his house, and he managed for his family to have better living conditions.  He says that before the loan his family did not have an adequate house.

Rubén is now requesting a new loan in order to improve his fishing materials.  One of the difficulties that Rubén has is that he does not have enough money to be able to buy cast nets and fishing nets in order to continue fishing and getting his income.

Rubén hopes to continue with a loan again in order for his family to continue prospering.

loans.use: to buy cast nets and fishing nets.

loans.name: Natela

texts.en:
Natela is a 63 years old married woman who lives with her pensioner husband and two children in Kobuleti district. 

The family is actively involved in agriculture. It has two cows, four calves and a plot of land where they grow maize and fruit trees. 

Natela works hard to ensure in a good harvest, and sells locally harvested products. She wants to build a greenhouse on unused land. 

The Start Up program, a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 6000 GEL to build a greenhouse and grow vegetables. This will increase her family's income and improve their living conditions. Natela awaits your support.

loans.use: to build a greenhouse.

loans.name: Nadou

texts.fr: Nadou est une femme mariée qui vit avec ses deux enfants à Vakpossito. Nadou est âgée de 37 ans et vend de la bouillie préparée à base du maïs dans son quartier. Nadou s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché pour disposer son stock. Pour commander quelques sacs de maïs, Nadou demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et gagner plus de bénéfice pour venir en aide aux diverses charges de sa famille.
texts.en: Nadou is a married woman who lives with her children in Vakpossito. Nadou is 38 years old, she sells gruel prepared from corn in her neighbourhood. Nadou buys her supplies three times every month at the market to have sufficient stock. To order some sacks of corn, Nadou requests this loan to realise her purchase and earn more profits to help with paying the various expenses of her family.

loans.use: to buy 3 sacs of corn.

loans.name: Abra

texts.fr: A 38 ans, Abra est une femme veuve et avec quatre enfants à sa charge. Abra vit dans le quartier de Vakpossito. Abra est une marchande de charbons de bois et s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché. Abra réalise une très bonne rentabilité avec son activité génératrice de revenu. Abra nécessite ce crédit pour acheter des sacs de charbons de bois pour gagner des bénéfices et venir en aide à l’éducation scolaire de son enfant.
texts.en: At 38 years old, Abra is a widow with four children to take care of. Abra lives in the Vakpossito district. She sells charcoal and stocks up three times every month at the market. Abra manages to generate a very good profitability with her money making venture. Abra needs this loan to buy sacks of charcoal to earn profits and help with paying the school fees for her child.

loans.use: to buy 7 sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Nazem

texts.en:
Nazem is a 19-years-old single man from Dier El-Balah City. He lives with his family in a small simple house. His father works as an employee in the public sector where he earns a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs. 

Nazem would like to improve his family's living conditions and buy all the needed stuff.

Nazem took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water. This will provide the family with hot water without using electricity.

Nazem appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar tiene 28 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge e hijos en el distrito de Pomahuaca, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, la población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de café, Cuenta con 15 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El crédito que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitaias, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para deshierbo de sus fincas de café variedad catimore, y así tener una cosecha oportuna, con esto Oscar espera obtener una mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Oscar, age 28, is in a common-law marriage.  He lives with his spouse and children in the Pomahuaca district, Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru.  Life in the district is peaceful.  The population mainly works in agriculture, in commerce, and with livestock.

He works in agriculture, and he has coffee crops.  He has 15 years of experience in the business, and he has very good personal and work references in the area.

He will use the loan for agricultural work, applications and incorporation of phytosanitary products, fertilizers, and to pay labor costs to weed his Catimore variety coffee farm.  This way he will have a fortuitous harvest.  

With this Oscar hopes to get greater production and a better quality product.  Then he will have no problems selling his product, which will generate greater earnings for him and will improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for agricultural work, applications and incorporation of phytosanitary products, fertilizers, and to pay labor costs to weed his coffee farm.

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en:
Ailyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Ailyn is 37 years old and has three children who are in school.

Ailyn has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more containers of coconut wine to sell. Ailyn has been in this business for five years. 

In the future, Ailyn would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more containers of coconut wine to sell

loans.name: Leng

texts.en:
A local farmer from Kam Rieng district of Battambang province, Leng is 57 years old. She is a mother of ten children, six of whom are dependent on her.

To support her family conditions, Leng grows cassava on a hectare area and works for others for a fee to supplement her income. 

For Leng, this is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She will spend her loan to plow the field to grow cassava, buy seed, pesticides and fertilizer for her cash crops and to rent farmland. 

She hopes that she can earn more money to support her children to attend university.

loans.use: to plow her fields, buy seed, pesticides and fertilizer for her cash crops and to rent farmland

loans.name: Abra

texts.fr: Abra est une femme veuve âgée de 37 ans. Abra vit avec ses cinq enfants à Vakpossito Abra vend des tapettes dans son quartier et arrive à subvenir favorablement à ses besoins. Abra s’approvisionne au marché trois fois par mois pour avoir en permanence son stock. Pour avoir une nouvelle commande, Abra sollicite ce crédit pour acheter de nouvelles tapettes à vendre à ses clients et réaliser plus de bénéfice pour aider ses enfants dans leur éducation.
texts.en: Abra is a 37 year old widow. She lives with her five children in Vakpossito. Abra sells fly swats in her district and manages to provide satisfactorily for her needs. Abra buys her supplies three times every month at the market to have sufficient stock. To make a new order, Abra requests this loan to buy new fly swats to sell to her clients and make more profits to help her children in their education.

loans.use: to buy three boxes of fly swats.

loans.name: Ami

texts.fr: Ami vit à Vakpossito et est âgée de 45 ans. Ami  est une femme veuve avec deux personnes à charge. Ami vend de la bouillie préparée à base du maïs dans le quartier et arrive à vendre grâce à son dynamisme. Ami s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pour acheter des sacs de maïs pour préparer sa bouillie, Ami demande ce crédit pour réaliser son achat et tirer le profit nécessaire pour aider ses enfants dans les diverses charges quotidiennes.
texts.en: Ami lives in Vakpossito and is 45 years old. Ami is a widow with two people who depend on her. Ami sells gruel prepared from corn in her district and manages to sell her goods, thanks to her great energy. Ami buys her supplies twice every month at the market. To buy some sacks of corn for the preparation of the gruel, Ami requests this loan to make her purchase, and to generate sufficient profits necessary to help her children in their daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of corn.

loans.name: Saverino

texts.en:
Saverino, 49, is married with four children ages 18, 16, 14 and 12. He trades coffee and this is his major source of income. 

He has applied for a loan of ugx 3,000,000 to buy mulch for spreading in his coffee plantation and to buy coffee for sale.

Saverino started his business in 1988 with high hopes of advancing from subsistence to commercial agriculture and generate income. He also rears cattle to supplement on his monthly income. His business is located in his the Nyanga  Bushenyi District and his clients are coffee factories in Bushenyi. 

He is a hard working man who works 10 hours a day. Saverino faced the challenge of price fluctuations but is determined to grow his business through his hard work. 

Saverino hopes to become financially stable and the leading producer of coffee in Bushenyi. He wants to own a factory to process coffee. He appreciates the services of UGAFODE and its partnership with Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy mulch.

loans.name: Adjovi

texts.fr: Adjovi vit à Avedji et est âgée de 44 ans. Adjovi  est une femme mariée avec six personnes à charge. Adjovi vend de la bouillie préparée à base du maïs dans le quartier et arrive à vendre grâce à son dynamisme. Adjovi s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché. Pour acheter des sacs de maïs pour préparer sa bouillie, Adjovi demande ce crédit pour réaliser son achat et tirer le profit nécessaire pour aider ses enfants dans les diverses charges quotidiennes
texts.en:
Adjovi lives in Avedji and is 44 years old. She is married with six dependents.

Adjovi sells porridge prepared from corn in her neighborhood, and makes sales thanks to her energetic personality. She procures supplies three times a month at the market.

Adjovi is requesting this loan to buy corn bags with which to prepare her porridge. By making this purchase, she will generate the necessary profit to help her children with a variety of daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy two bags of corn

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Ablavi est une femme mariée de 45 ans qui vit à Vakpossito avec un enfant à sa charge. Ablavi est très dynamique et met son aptitude à aider son mari dans les charges quotidiennes de la famillle en vendant des pagnes dans le quartier. Ablavi s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché. Pour passer une nouvelle commande, Ablavi demande ce crédit pour acheter des pièces de pagnes et réaliser le bénéfice qu’elle souhaite afin d’aider son enfant.
texts.en:
Ablavi is a 45-year-old married woman who lives in Vakpossito with one dependent child. She is very enterprising and puts her ability in the service of helping her husband with the family’s daily expenses by selling cloth in the neighboring area.

Ablavi procures her supplies three times a month from the market. To place a new order, she is requesting this loan. It will allow her to purchase coupons of fabric and to make the profit she wants to help her child.

loans.use: to buy a few coupons of local fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: hoeing and mulching.

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon is 30 years old. She is a married lady and is blessed with two school-going children. She has been selling french fries to her customers in Nakuru town for the last five years, and the business is doing great. 

She will be using the loan to purchase potatoes and hopes this will help her get profit. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to have a  successful business, buy a plot of land and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy potatoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Range Group

texts.en:
Amina, who is in her early 40s, is single with three kids; two of them are in school and one is still small.  She has been selling fish for eight years now.  She works from 04am to 10pm daily and is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This will be Amina's eleventh loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to keep increasing the fish stock, and has paid back all her loans successfully. She is happy with the loan, and appreciates Kiva for their support. She used the profits to pay school fees, build her house, make the loan repayment and covered household expenses.  

She will use this loan to increase the fish stock and sell to more customers.  She dreams of traveling to America with her kids and having a good life.

Amina will share this loan with her loan group, "Range", which has four members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase fish stock

loans.name: Yon

texts.en:
Yon is a 59-year-old widowed rice farmer with one grownup child. She lives in the Kampong Speu province in Cambodia. She has been cultivating rice for more than 24 years. Yon and her child can earn around $6 per day. 

Now Yon would like to request a loan to buy bricks and cement to build a ground-floor room. With this loan, she will be able to have additional space for living. In the future, she is going to buy more soil to fill in the yard around her house.

loans.use: to buy bricks and cement to build a ground-floor room

loans.name: Agustin

texts.es:
Agustín tiene 54 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge en el distrito de Oyotún, una zona rural ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. La vida en el distrito es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en su moto carguera. Cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. El presente crédito será para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su moto ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, para poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, con esto el espera obtener mayores ingresos y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Agustín Is 54 years old and is in a common-law relationship. He lives with his spouse in the district of Oyotún, a rural area in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the North Coast of Peru. Life in the district is quiet and it's inhabitants work mainly in agriculture and raising animals.

Agustín works offering services with his motorcycle cargo carrier. He has more than 5 years experience in the business and has very good personal and work references in his district. The present loan will be used to do repairs and maintenance on his motorcycle as it currently is in poor condition. Then he can provide better service to his clients and doing that he hopes to make more income and in the end improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to undertake repairs and maintenance on his motorcycle which is currently in poor condition.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Josefina works hard to support her family.

Josefina has a beauty products retail business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from raising livestock. 

Josefina is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to buy more beauty products to offer for sale.

Josefina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save enough money so that she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products to offer for sale.

loans.name: Roma

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Roma works hard to support her family.

Roma has a buy and sell banana business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from food vending and fishing.  

Roma is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to  purchase sacks of bananas to sell in her buy and sell banana business.

Roma has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of bananas to sell

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en:
Antonia is a married woman with 12 children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Antonia is 61 years old now.

Antonia has a buy and sell root crops business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more root crops to sell in her stall.

Antonia has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more root crops to sell in her stall

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Fifty-six-year-old Hellen does not have any academic papers, but she is an accomplished farmer from the Siongiroi area of Kenya and commands a lot of respect. She is happily married, and together with her handsome husband, they are blessed with a lovely family. 

For the past 20 years Hellen has been involved in mixed farming. Hellen has identified free space on her farm and wants to fully utilize this space by keeping a good-quality dairy cow. 

Dairy farming in Kenya is a very profitable venture and milk prices have been going up in the recent past, so Hellen, being a visionary and entrepreneurial woman, wants to take full advantage of this. She has chosen the breed of cow that she will keep, and she knows that she will get not only milk from the cow but also manure, and this will boost the fertility of her farm. Selling her milk will never be a problem because there is a ready market and she will also be selling to big dairy processing firms. 

Hellen said she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because they offer agricultural-based loans, and their interest rate is both low and on a reducing basis. She underwent training through Juhudi Kilimo, and from this training she learned that saving is a continuous process in many microfinance institutions. 

Hellen hopes that through the accumulated profit she will be able to add value to her milk by starting services such as packaging and the production of other dairy products. This loan will change her life and will secure the future of her children and ageing parents.

loans.use: To buy a quality breed of dairy cow

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.en:
Antonieta is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Antonieta is 48 years old, and has one child in school.

Antonieta has a buy and sell ready-to-wear business in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more items to sell like pants, blouses, etc..

Antonieta has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like pants, blouses, etc.

loans.name: Jade

texts.en:
Jade is 48 years old and married with two children, both of whom are in school.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Jade is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Jade has been raising pigs for 20 years, and also earns additional income from frozen foods retailing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Avita

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Avita works hard to support her family.

She has a buying and selling of dried fish business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Avita is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to  buy more stock of dried fish to sell in her stall for her buying and selling of dried fish business.

Avita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of dried fish to sell in her stall

loans.name: Eunies

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Eunies works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Eunies is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment for her fishing business.

Eunies has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Everlyne's Group

texts.en:
Everlyne is 37 years old and has seven children. She is a group leader and is representing her group formed by eight farmers in Webuye District, Kenya. 

Everlyne has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to earn enough to feed her family and, although she described her last harvest as very good, she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. 

Everlyne also decided to purchase two solar lights as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study.

Obtaining this loan means that Everlyne's Group will be able to receive a total of six solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 5 acres."

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Hery Lalaina

texts.fr:
Machiniste de formation, Lalaina travaillait entant que machiniste dans une entreprise de zone franche  pendant 4 ans avant 2004. Ce qui explique sa bonne maitrise de la machine industrielle.
Puis, depuis, elle a eu l'idée de travailler pour son propre compte car elle pensait avoir de l'expérience.
Elle commençait à confectionner des tenus de sport (maillots) et les vendait sur le marché local et peu de temps après, elle arrive à attirer beaucoup de clients et  avoir beaucoup de commande. Par conséquent, elle n'a pas du tout le temps de vendre sur le marché.
Pour honorer certaines commandes disons spéciales, elle a besoin d'un prêt pour acheter des tissus (citizen) de différentes couleurs. En plus, elle compte ouvrir un vrai atelier de confection parce que maintenant elle utilise son domicile.
Lalaina est une femme très travailleuse et créative, car c'est elle même qui fait la sérigraphie
Elle est mariée et a 3 enfants. Son mari est transporteur et ses enfants vont tous à l'école.
texts.en:
Lalaina is trained as a machine operator, she worked as a machine operator in a firm in the free zone for four years before 2004. This accounts for her good mastery of industrial machines.
Then, she had the idea of self-employment, as she thought she had sufficient experience.
