Com o salário que aufere, divide em dispesas de casa e da faculdade, daí que recorre ao empréstimo para pagar propinas escolares, pois, com salário, nao chega para todas as suas dispesas.
Sonha em terminar os seus estudos para depois definir outras prioridades.
Devido a falta de dinheiro que constitue um obstáculo para os seus projectos, tem como o desafio reembolsar o empréstimo dentro do prazo acordado para poder ceder ao outro.
texts.en:
Abilio is 27 years old. He's a teacher at a primary school and also a college student. He lives with his mother who is a farmer, and he takes care of her. The salary he earns is divided between college and household expenses. That's why he applies for a loan in order to pay for school fees, since he his salary isn't enough to afford all his expenses.
He dreams of finishing his studies so he can then establish new priorities.
Becaue the lack of money constitutes an obstacle for his projects, his challenge is repaying the loan within the agreed-upon timeframe so that he can apply for another one.

loans.use: to pay for school fees.

loans.name: Maria Liberta

texts.es:
Maria, de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado, sus padres no contaban con los recursos económicos para que siguiera estudiando, está casada y su esposo trabaja en la agricultura, ella es madre de 5 hijos, de los cuales solo estudian tres, solo sus hijos dependen economicamente de ella.

María, se dedica a la crianza de especies menores, tiene 12 años de dedicarse a este oficio, que aprendió de sus padres.- Además, apoya a su esposo en trabajos de la agricultura, sus cultivos están a una distancia de 2 kilómetros y llega hasta ahí caminando, su horario es de 9:00 a.m. hasta las 2:30 p.m. para atender a sus hijos.

María, está solicitando el crédito para comprar dos vacas de repasto, ella espera seguir ampliando su hato ganadero y tener más ingresos en un futuro.

María, sueña con poder preparar a sus hijos académicamente, ampliar su producción de ganado y poder construir su propia casa, ya que donde ella vive no es propio.
texts.en: Maria is 37 years old. She only studied until the first grade. Her  parents did not have the economic resources to allow her to continue studying. She is married and her husband works in agriculture. Maria is the mother of 5 children, of whom three are school aged. Only her sons are economically dependent on her. Maria works raising young animals. She has spent 12 years on this work that she learned from her parents. In addition, she supports her husband with his agricultural work. Their crops are 2 kilometers away and they arrive there by walking. Her work hours are from 9:00am to 2:30pm so she can attend to her children. Maria is seeking this loan to purchase two cows for grazing. She hopes to continue increasing the size of her herd  and to obtain more earnings in the future. Maria dreams of being able to prepare her children academically, of increasing the production of her animals, and of being able to construct her own home because she does not own where she currently lives.

loans.use: to buy two cows for grazing.

loans.name: Cfjdt 30 Group

texts.fr: CFJDT 30 est un sous groupe de la Convergence des Femmes et Jeunes pour le Développement de Tassette. Il est composé de 6 femmes et 1 homme qui habitent dans le village de Tassette à quelques kilomètres de Guichet et qui pratiquent les mêmes activités. Ils se réunissent à chaque fois de besoin et organisent des tontines pour le développement et la solidarité. La présidente s'appelle KHADY, elle est reconnue sur la photo par la main levée. Elle est mariée et mère de famille qui évolue dans l'élevage des ovins et des bovines, elle a une expérience de 15 ans et sollicite ce montant pour aller dans les marchés hebdomadaires pour acheter des moutons et des bœufs pour les élever et les vendre pendant les grandes fêtes. Elle secourue son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes et les frais de scolarités et médicaux de ses enfants. Elle commence sa journée à 6h pour la terminer à 18h du soir. A l'avenir elle souhaite obtenir une ferme agricole pour diversifier et augmenter ses revenus. Ainsi elle pourra épargner de l'argent et améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en:
CFJDT 30 is a sub-group of “Convergence des Femmes et Jeunes pour le Développement de Tassette”. It is composed of six women and one man who live in the village of Tassette, located a few kilometers from the branch office. The group members meet whenever there is a need and organize tontines for the purposes of development and solidarity. 

The president’s name is KHADY. She is recognized in the photo by her raised hand. She is a married mother with a family, and she works in the animal husbandry of sheep and cattle. She has over fifteen years of experience and is requesting this sum of money to go to the weekly markets for purchasing sheep and cattle to raise and resell during the holiday seasons. 

She comes to the aid of her husband in managing her children’s day-to-day expenses and their medical and schooling costs. Her day starts at 6 AM and ends at 6 PM. 

For the future, she would like to obtain a farm to diversify and increase her revenues. Thus, she will be able to save some money and improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and cattle to raise and resell during the holiday seasons

loans.name: Lizi

texts.pt:
A sra Lizi tem 40 anos de idade, solteira e mãe de 04 filhos que frequentam o ensino primário e superior, respectivamente. Não sustenta mais ninguém, vive em casa própria.
É negociante há mais de 10 anos e o montante solicitado (40.000,00mts), será aplicado na compra de  camas, cadeiras sofás, comodas, sapatos para revender e, o seu sonho é construir uma outra casa num outro espaço que adquiriu há pouco tempo. Sonha ainda em ter uma viatura para facilitar nas deslocações, pois, tem enfrentado dificuldade enorme em transportar do material de casa para o mercado e vice-versa.
texts.en:
Lizi is 40 years old and single. She has four children who attend primary school and college, respectively. She doesn't support anyone else and lives in a house that she owns.
She has been a trader for over 10 years. The amount of the loan (40,000.00mt) will be used to purchase beds, chairs, sofas, dressers and shoes for re-selling. Her dream is to build a house on another plot that she recently acquired. She also dreams of having a vehicle to make it easier for her to get around, because she has been facing enormous difficulties transporting supplies from her home to the market and back.

loans.use: to purchase beds, chairs, sofas, dressers and shoes for re-selling.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
La socia Irene pertenece al banco comunal SAN BARTOLOME DE TAMBO REAL ,la socia continua  dedicándose a la producción y venta de leche, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia vende la leche a todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de una vaca.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member Irene belongs to the communal bank “San Bartolome De Tambo Real.”  She continues to work at the production and sale of milk.  She has been doing this business for a while and it is going well thanks to the determined effort she puts every day into her business.  She sells milk to all her customers who request it.  She wants to be able to continue working and in this way continue supporting her family.

She is asking for the loan to buy a cow.  She feels grateful for the loan granted and commits to making her loan payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fabrics, shoes, and incense to resell

loans.name: Alejandro Antonio

texts.es:
Alejandro, de 38 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, la situación económica no le permitió seguir estudiando, está casado y su esposa se dedica a la crianza de especies menores, es padre de tres hijos, todos están estudiando, nadie más vive con él y solo dependen economicamnte sus tres hijos y su esposa.

Alejandro, se dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería, trabajo que realiza desde hace 25 años y que aprendió de sus padres, la distancia que camina para llegar hasta su lugar de trabajo es de tres kilómetros y su horario es de 7:00 a.m. hasta las 4:00 p.m.

Alejandro, está solicitando el crédito para comprar dos vacas de engorde, con esto espera mejorar su hato ganadero y productivo.

Alejandro, sueña con poder mejorar su crianza de ganado, además sueña con poder comprar un lote de terreno, para poder construir su propia casa.
texts.en: Alejandro is 38 years old. He studied until the 5th grade. His economic situation did not allow him to continue studying. He is married and his wife works raising young animals. He is the father of three children who are all in school. No one else lives with him and only his three children and his wife depend on him economically. Alejandro works in agriculture and livestock, work he has performed for 25 years that he learned from his parents. He walks a distance of 3 kilometers to arrive at his workplace. His hours are from 7:00am to 4:00pm. Alejandro is seeking a loan to purchase two cows for slaughter with which he hopes to improve his herd and production. Alejandro dreams of being able to improve the livestock he raises and in addition, he dreams of being able to purchase his own land to construct his own home.

loans.use: to purchase two cows for slaughter.

loans.name: Vitoria

texts.pt:
A Sra Vitoria, de 35 anos de idade, solteira e mãe de 06 filhos dos quais 04 frequentam o ensino escolar e os restantes  são recém-nascidos. Para além dos seus filhos, sustenta ainda dois sobrinhos, filhos do seu irmão.
Tem uma Mercearia no seu quintal que fez atraves do financiamento passado e com este financiamento, pretende reforçar o seu negócio comprando produtos tais como: arroz, vinagre, feijao, peixe carrapau, refrescos e cerveja para revender e sonha em ter uma loja bem grande que tenha todo tipo de produtos, todavia, para almejar o seu sonho, tem o desafio de trabalhar arduamente, pese embora enfrenta dificuldades financeiras.
texts.en:
Victoria is 35 years old and single. She has six children, four of whom attend school and the rest of them are newborns. Aside from her children she also supports two nephews who are her brother's children.
She runs a grocery store on her yard. She set up the store by getting a previous loan. With this loan she intends to stock her business by purchasing products such as rice, vinegar, beans, horse mackerel, refreshments and beer for re-selling. She dreams of owning a very large store that sells every type of merchandise. However, in order to achieve her dream, she tackles the challenge of working very hard in spite of the financial hardships she faces.

loans.use: to purchase products such as rice, vinegar, beans, horse mackerel, refreshments and beer.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Beira Província de Sofala tem 36 anos de idade, solteira mãe de 3 filhos menores de idade apenas 2 frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É avicultora a mais de 11 anos onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Na tentativa de satisfazer os seus clientes solicita um empréstimo para aumentar o volume do seu negócio de criação de frangos adquirindo pintos, ração e vitaminas. Este é o seu 5º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra, expandir mais o seu negócio de criação de frangos e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Delfina comes from the province of Sofala. She's 36 years old and single. She has three underage children, only two of whom attend school. She's not responsible for anyone else.
She has been a poultry farmer for over 11 years and earns a profit which she uses for household expenses. As a way of keeping her customers satisfied, she requests a loan so that she can increase turnover in her poultry business by purchasing chicks, feed and vitamins. This is her 5th loan with Hluvuku.
In the future she intends to finish her construction work, further expand her poultry farming business and ensure her children's education all the way to college.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is 32 years old. She is a single mother of three school-going children. She has had a farming business for 14 years. 

She will be using the loan to purchase farm inputs for crop production and hopes this will help her pay school fees for her children. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to grow her business and be stable financially.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs for crop production to help her pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Homoine província de Inhambane tem 72 anos de idade, viúvo pai de 6 filhos maiores de idades, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É reformando e aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com o valor solicitado pretende dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como: areia, cimento e chapas. Este é o seu 4º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende adquirir bens para sua residência como congelador e cama para mobilar a sua casa.
texts.en:
Alberto comes from Homoine, province of Inhambane. He's 72 years old and a widower. He has six adult children and he's not responsible for anyone else.
He's retired and earns an income which he uses for household expenses. With the requested amount he intends to continue building his house by purchasing construction supplies such as sand, cement and plates. This is his 4th loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to purchase goods for his house such as a freezer and a bed to furnish his home.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as sand, cement and plates.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Ricardina

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Manjacaze Província de Gaza tem 40 anos de idade, solteira mãe de 2 filhos apenas 1 é maior de idade e só 1 frequenta a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É negociante a mais de 9 anos onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Na tentativa de satisfazer os seus clientes solicita um empréstimo para aumentar o volume do seu negócio adquirindo mercadoria como, feijão e amendoim. Este é o seu 6º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
 Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra de residência e expandir mas no seu negócio para sustentar a sua família.
texts.en:
Ricardina comes from Manjacaze, province of Gaza. She's 40 years old and single. She has two children, only one of whom is an adult and attends school. She's not responsible for anyone else.
She has been a trader for over 9 years and earns a profit which she uses for household expenses. As a way of keeping her customers satisfied, she requests a loan in order to increase turnover in her business by purchasing merchandise such as beans and peanuts. This is her 6th loan with Hluvuku.
In the future she intends to finish building her home and further expand her business so that she can support her family.

loans.use: to purchase beans and peanuts for re-selling.

loans.name: Neama

texts.en: Neama is 22 years old and from Minia. She is married with a two-year-old son. Her husband is a part-time farmer. Neama and her husband have a small grocery store in their house that she runs to help her husband with the family income. Her project was negatively affected because of the family's bad economic conditions and the increase in their expenses. She does not have enough products to meet the demands of her customers and as a result she could not cover her family's expenses. Neama requested a 3,000 EGP loan from TADE to buy products for her store such as rice, pasta, and oil.

loans.use: to buy products for her store such as rice, pasta, and oil.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Almost all of the young generation of Kenyans struggle to make their way in the world because of unemployment, lack of opportunities and lack of capital. This is true for Sarah, who is based in the Siongiroi area of Kenya. She has been practicing mixed farming for the past 10 years. She has managed to earn a decent income. Her primary source of income has been milk, eggs, crops, and some personal business she engages in to make ends meet. She passionately loves dairy farming, and when asked what is most enjoyable about dairy farming, she stated “feeding my cows.” 

Sarah sells milk to her neighbors and to the local market, but the demand has been overwhelming, and she cannot meet the demand. For this reason, she is seeking a loan to buy an extra dairy cow, which will assist in increasing milk productivity. The dairy cow that she plans to buy is not just an ordinary cow; it’s a quality breed of dairy cow that will be producing between 10-20 liters of milk a day. This will immediately translate to more profit margins and increased income levels. Profits from selling milk will be used in repaying the loan in full, and the extra income will be used to increase her business enterprise. 

Sarah is very visionary, and she intends that in the near future she will start adding value to her milk business through packaging the milk before selling, and also to start selling dairy products such as yogurt. An improved income level will assure her family of a secure future. By joining Juhudi Kilimo, which assists smallholder farmers, she will also benefit from free extension services and links to markets. Support Sarah so that she can continue with her dairy farming!

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan es un joven de 25 años amante del derecho, la justicia y decidido a contribuir a la búsqueda de una sociedad llena de paz y amor. Él estudia el último año de esta carrera y decidió estudiarla ya que deseaba conocer las leyes del país y defender a las demás personas. Actualmente labora como cajero en una compañía para ayudar económicamente a su familia y sus estudios. Su único apoyo son su madre y abuela. 

Juan solicita el crédito porque desea pagar los gastos del curso de titulación y tramite de títulos, los cuales, le ayudaran a convertirse en un profesional del derecho. Sus metas y planes son crecer profesionalmente y estudiar un posgrado para conseguir un mejor empleo.
texts.en:
Juan is a young man of 25 years. He is a lover of the law and justice, and decided to contribute to the search for a society filled with peace and love. He is studying in his last year of law and decided to pursue this program because he desired to know the laws of the country and to defend others. He currently works as a bank teller to help his family financially and to pay for his studies. His only source of support comes from his mother and grandmother.

Juan is applying for the loan because he wishes to pay for his degree and application for his degree, which will help him become a professional in the law. His goal and plan is to grow professionally and to attend graduate school to obtain better employment.

loans.use: to pay course expenses for his degree and applying for his degree

loans.name: Alicia Janeth

texts.es:
Alicia tiene 36 años de edad es casada tiene 3 hijos con ellos vive en Guaranda, provincia de Bolivar en la comunidad Corralpamba.

Ella se dedica a la compra y crio de animales, solicita el credito para la compra de ganado para producir leche y vender a sus clientes, gracias a este credito podra mejorar su economia y sacar adelante a sus hijos. Las compras realiza en guaranda cada semana, su sueño es mejorar su casa ya que esta a medio terminar para asi poder darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, en su tiempo libre le guta pasar con su familia.
texts.en:
Alicia is 36 years old. She is married and has 3 children. She lives with them in Guaranda, Bolivar province in the community of Corralpamba.

She works buying and raising animals. She is asking for the loan to buy cattle to produce milk and sell it to her customers. Thanks to this loan, she will be able to improve her finances and get her children ahead. She makes her purchases in Guaranda every week. Her dream is to improve her home since it is  half finished. That way, she can improve her family's quality of life. In her free time, she likes to be with her family.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Inhambane tem 36 anos de idade, vive maritalmente é pai de 2 filhos menores de idade não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É agricultor há bastante tempo, explora uma área de 5 hectares. Com este empréstimo pretende preparar a terra e adquirir insumos agrícolas (plantulas de morango). Este é o seu 3º empréstimo na Hluvuku, sendo que os últimos foram aplicados para mesma  actividade.
Futuramente pretende concluir a sua obra de residência e iniciar um negócio de criação de frangos para revenda. O seu maior desafio é a falta de viatura para transportar os seus produtos
texts.en:
Eusebio comes from Inhambane. He's 36 years old and married. He has two underage children and he's not responsible for anyone else.
He has been a farmer for a long time. He farms an area of 5 hectares. With this loan he intends to prepare the land and purchase farm supplies (strawberry seedlings). This is his third loan with Hluvuku and the previous loans were used for the same business.
In the future he intends to finish building his home and start a business raising chickens for re-selling. His biggest challenge is not having a vehicle for carrying his produce.

loans.use: to prepare the land and purchase farm supplies (strawberry seedlings).

loans.name: Frederico

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Massinga Província de Inhambane tem 35 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 1 filha menor de idade e frequenta a escola, responsabiliza-se pelos seus pais que vivem em Inhambane enviando lhes dinheiro.
É Segurança a mais de 4 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com o valor solicitado pretende dar continuidade com a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como: areia, cimento e mais. Este é o seu 6º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende iniciar um negócio de criação de frangos e garantir o ensino da sua filha até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Frederico comes from Massinga, province of Inhambane. He's 35 years old and married. He has a daughter who's underage and in school. He also supports his parents who live in Inhambane by sending them money.
He has been a security guard for over four years and earns an income which he uses for household expenses. With the requested amount he intends to continue building his home by purchasing construction supplies such as sand, cement, etc. This is his 6th loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to start a chicken farm business and ensure his daughter's education all the way to college.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as sand, cement, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Ali

texts.fr:
Mr  ALI  est marié sans enfant. Il a 01  personne en charge.
Mr est vendeur de chaussure depuis 2ans 10 mois. Il s’approvisionne dans le  marché  de son quartier.
Avec l’argent octroyé, il compte acheter 05 sachets de chaussures de 30 paires pour hommes et 02 sachets de chaussures pour femmes.
Il  veut utiliser les  bénéfices du prêt pour terminer sa construction. Il ambitionne devenir un grand commerçant et aller à l’extérieur.
texts.en: Mr. ALI is married and has no children. He has one person to support. ALI has been a vendor of shoes for two years and 10 months. And he gets his supplies from the market in his neighborhood. With the money granted, he intends to purchase five of men’s shoes at 30 pairs per bag; and two bags of women’s shoes. He wants to use the profits from the loan to finish his construction. His ambition is to become a major merchant and to go abroad.

loans.use: to purchase shoes for men and women

loans.name: Christ The King Savings Group

texts.en:
Josinta is 29 years old, a hard working married woman with three children. She is a member of Christ the King savings group and lives in Kasese Uganda. 

Josinta operates a general store shop to look after her family. She gets additional income by selling cassava flour.

Since Josinta didn't go to school she is looking forward to educating her children, to help them attain a better future. 

However, Josinta faces the challenge of limited capital. She is requesting a loan to buy cassava flour, soap and sugar for selling.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour, soap and sugar.

loans.name: Maira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maira, de 39  años de edad, tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar nivel superior, está separada de su esposo y es madre de tres hijos, los cuales estudian y viven con ella.

Maira, trabaja como impulsadora de una empresa desde hace 10 años, anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de cosméticos por revista.- Ahora, viaja en bus 45 minutos para llegar a su lugar de trabajo y su horario comienza a las 8:00 a.m. y finaliza a las 4:30 p.m.

Maira, está solicitando el crédito para comprar materiales de construcción, para mejorar su vivienda, de esta manera dará una mejor comodidad de vida a sus hijos.

Maira, sueña en un futuro tener mejor sueldo y poder ver a sus hijos graduados de una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Maira is 39 years old. She had the opportunity to study at a higher level. She is separated from her husband and is the mother of three children, who are students and live with her. 

Maira has worked as a saleswoman for a company for the past 10 years. Previously she made a living selling cosmetics through magazines. Now, she travels 45 minutes by bus to arrive at her place of work and her schedule starts at 8:00 a.m. and ends at 4:30 p.m. 

Maira is applying for the loan to buy construction materials to improve her home. In this way she will be provide greater comfort for her children. 

Maira dreams of having a better salary in the future and of being able to see her children graduate with a university degree.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to improve her home

loans.name: Beneti

texts.en: Beneti lives in Kasese, Uganda. He is married with four children who all attend school. Beneti has earned a living through poultry farming and has used his profits to start a chicken feed shop for additional income. He has a dream to educate his children at good schools. However, Beneti is faced with a challenge of market competition. He is requesting a loan to purchase poultry feed.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed to sell.

loans.name: José Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto, de 34 años de edad, solo pudo estudiar hasta bachillerato, debido a la situacion economica de sus padres, no pudo seguir estudiando una carrera universitaria, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar, es padre de un hijo de 7 años de edad, que está estudiando en la escuela de su comunidad.

Roberto, se dedica a trabajar de vigilante en una ferretería desde hace 4 meses, decidio arriesgarse a trabajar como vigilante a pesar de la situación de violencia que atraviesa nuestro país, porque no tenía otra oferta de trabajo y necesitaba suplir las necesidades básicas de su familia.- Antes, trabajaba en la agricultura, la distancia de su trabajo, está a 6 kilómetros desde su casa, su horario de trabajo es permanecer 24 horas laborando y luego descansa 24 horas.
 
Roberto, está solicitando el crédito para comprar lámina y hierro para mejorar su vivienda, porque se acerca el invierno y quiere estar listo para que su familia no se moje.

Roberto, sueña en un futuro poder conseguir un mejor trabajo, con mejor sueldo y mayor seguridad, para poder dar un mejor futuro a su familia y para que su hijo estudie.
texts.en:
Roberto, who is 34 years old, was only able to study until high school. Due to the financial situation of his parents, he was not able to continue studying in university. He is married and his wife is a homemaker. He is the father of a 7-year-old child who is studying in a school in their community. 

Roberto has worked as a security guard in a hardware store for the past 4 months. He decided to risk working as a security guard in spite of the violent situation that exists throughout his country, because he did not have any other job opportunities and he needed to provide his family with basic necessities. Previously, he worked in agriculture. His current job is 6 kilometers from his home, and his work schedule is to work for 24 hours, and then to rest for 24 hours. 

Roberto is applying for the loan to buy iron and a metal sheet to improve his home, because winter is coming and he wants to be ready so that his family does not get wet. 

Roberto dreams of in the future being able to find better work, with a better salary and greater security, in order to be able to provide a better future for his family so that his child can go to school.

loans.use: to buy iron and metal sheeting to improve his home, because winter is coming and he wants to be ready so that his family does not get wet

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy underwear and sell to customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase motorcycle items to sell.

loans.name: Hoida

texts.en:
Hoida is 26 years old from Minia. She is married and has three kids. Her husband fattens cattle. 

And they own a small grocery project. Hoida sells fruits and vegetables in front of their house. However, she can't afford to buy the fruits and vegetables due to a lack of cash. This negatively affected her monthly income. 

So Hoaida requested a 3000 EGP loan to buy fruits and vegetables at lower prices. As a result, she hopes to increase her income and her family's living condition.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Hend

texts.en: Hend is a 28-year-old woman from Minia with three children.  Her husband is a part-time farmer.  They have a small cafe that she runs in the morning and that her husband runs in the afternoon. They are very ambitious to develop their project.  Minia requested a 3,000 EGP loan from TADE to buy a TV and some fizzy drinks for their cafe.

loans.use: to buy a TV and some fizzy drinks for their restaurant.

loans.name: Ibrahima

texts.fr:
Âgé de 27 ans, Ibrahima loge à quelques pas du guichet seulement n’a jamais bénéficié de crédit. Il est marié et père de deux enfants un garçon et une fille âgés respectivement de 8 ans et 6 ans. 
Son commerce consiste à vendre du poisson, activité qu’il exerce depuis 6 ans. Chaque jour il achète du poisson et de la glace pour conserver. Il vend dans le marché et dans son quartier ou il compte une large clientèle. Il est actif toute la journée de 7h à 18h de l’après-midi. Ibrahima vit en grande famille et s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne appuyé par ses frères dans la maison.
Le rêve d’Ibrahima est de développer son commerce, il pense même acquérir des pirogues un jour dans le cadre de maximiser son profit.
texts.en:
Ibrahima, aged 27, is staying just a few steps away from the branch office and has never had a loan. He is a married father of two children, a boy and a girl, aged 8 and 6, respectively. Ibrahima’s business involves selling fish. He has been in this business for six years. Each day, he buys fish and some ice to keep it. He makes his sales at a market and in his neighborhood, where he has a large customer base. He is active all day, from 7 AM until 6 PM. 

Ibrahima lives in a large family and takes care of the day-to-day expenses with the help of his brothers at home. Ibrahima’s dream is to develop his business. He is even thinking of acquiring some small fishing boats one day for the purpose of maximing his profit.

loans.use: to purchase fish to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fabrics, perfumes, shoes, and frying chickens over time, so as to resell

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es:
La socia Leonarda  pertenece al banco comunal SAN BARTOLOME DE TAMBO REAL, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la ganadería y a la crianza de animales menores, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia Leonarda solicito el crédito para la compra de una vaca.
La socia está muy agradecida con KIVA por ayudarla a desarrollarse en su actividad y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The member Leonarda belongs to the community bank SAN BARTOLOME DE TAMBO REAL. The member alternates her daily activities, dedicating herself to farming and raising young animals. The member's business is doing well thanks to the time she spends developing it each day. She would like to be able to continue working in this way to continue supporting her family. 

The member Leonarda is applying for a loan to buy a cow. She is very thankful to KIVA for helping her develop her business and she promises to comply with the repayment of her loan.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Moises

texts.es:
Moises es un hombre de 34 años de edad, casado, tiene 2 hijos de 6 y 1 año y su negocio es la pesca.
Él es buen padre, independiente, emprendedor, constante, responsable y muy trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la comunidad ‘Cachilaya’ circundante al lago sagrado Titicaca, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 0 – 12 grados centígrados.
Moises es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua nativa es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. su vida la comparte con su esposa que trabaja como pesquera y con sus hijos; el mayor está iniciando a estudiar en la escuela el menor aún es un bebé, viven en una casa propia construida de adobe con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua de pozo y energía eléctrica. Su negocio es la pesca, las variedades más comunes son; pejerrey, mauri, ispi, trucha y otros, actividad que comienza colocando las redes de pesca por las noches para recogerlas por la madrugada, todos los días de la semana. “inicie mi negocio por herencia familiar, tengo mi bote de pesca que necesita mantenimiento…” comenta. La ventaja de su trabajo es que lleva varios años de experiencia la desventaja es que existen temporadas donde no su puede pescar. Su sueño es construir una casa de ladrillo, el desea realizar la compra de un bote de pesca nuevo porque el que tiene ya no ofrece las medidas de seguridad mínimas para su trabajo. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 8 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Moises solicita un préstamo para la compra de un bote de pesca para pescar y con los beneficios construir una casa de ladrillo.
texts.en:
Moises is a 34-year-old man, who is married and has two children—aged 6 and 1. He makes a living as a fisherman.

A good father and a hard worker, he is independent, enterprising, perseverant, and responsible. 

He runs his business in the community of Cachilaya, which surrounds the Sacred Lake Titicaca. The climate is cold and dry, and the temperature varies between 0 and 12 degrees Celsius (32 and 54 degrees Fahrenheit) during the day.

Moises is short, with a slim build. He has a tanned complexion, short black hair, and brownish-grey eyes. His mother tongue is Aymara, which is spoken in the area, and he speaks Spanish for general knowledge and business purposes. 

He shares his life with his wife, who works as a fisherwoman, and their children. The eldest has just started going to school, and the youngest is still a baby. They all live in their own home—an adobe house that has a corrugated iron roof, electricity, and access to a water well. 

Moises's occupation is fishing. He starts his work by casting the fishing nets at dusk and then collects them at dawn every day of the week. The most common varieties he catches are silverside, mauri (a small catfish), ispi (a tiny sardine-shaped fish), and trout, among others. "I inherited the family business. I have my fishing boat, which needs maintenance," he says.

He has the advantage of having many years of experience, but the disadvantage is that there are seasons in which fishing cannot be done.  

His dream is to build a brick house. 

He wants to buy a new fishing boat because the one he owns doesn't meet the minimum safety requirements for his work.

This is his first loan cycle with the Institution in eight years that he has been following this occupation independently.

For these reasons, Moises is requesting a loan to purchase a fishing boat to do his job. With the profits from his work, he plans to build a brick house.

loans.use: to purchase a fishing boat to do his job and build a brick house with the profits from his work.
